comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Billboard of Oct 25, 1947 says that there are four brothers. books.google.com/books?id=-R4EAAAAMBAJ&pg=PT35 And the unidentified guy certainly looks like Noro. If he's the fourth brother (a saxophonist), he's Jose.

comment.author: 23086680@N02
comment._content: I just found out my Great Aunt Dolores Lopez (Lola) was once married to Lolo Morales, pretty cool.  They had a club called "El Piccolino" in San Juan.
